pr_title: fixes #826 Stop looping over terms once threshold is reached

timeline.message: fixes #826 Stop looping over terms once threshold is reached

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this is correct.  Using the return value from fieldsToValues.put being false does not mean that fieldsToValues.get(field).isThresholdExceeded().  The return value could be false because that value was already in the set.
timeline.author: ivakegg

replies.bodyText: you are right, if the key is already present in the underlying value hashset it will return false.
replies.author: FineAndDandy

timeline.message: fixes #826: check field values exceeded before incrementing valueExceededCount
